verses.verse: A <S%H8605>Prayer<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H6664>right,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7181>attend<s%> unto my <S%H7440>cry,<s%> give <S%H238>ear<s%> unto my <S%H8605>prayer,<s%> that goeth <S%H3808>not<s%> out of <S%H4820>feigned<s%> <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
Let my <S%H4941>sentence<s%> come <S%H3318>forth<s%> from thy <S%H4480>presence;<s%> <S%H6440><s%> let thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H2372>behold<s%> the things that are <S%H4339>equal.<s%>

Thou hast <S%H974>proved<s%> mine <S%H3820>heart;<s%> thou hast <S%H6485>visited<s%> me in the <S%H3915>night;<s%> thou hast <S%H6884>tried<s%> me, and shalt <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H1077>nothing;<s%> I am <S%H2161>purposed<s%> that my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall <S%H1077>not<s%> <S%H5674>transgress.<s%>

Concerning the <S%H6468>works<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of thy <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> have <S%H8104>kept<s%> me from the <S%H734>paths<s%> of the <S%H6530>destroyer.<s%>
Hold <S%H8551>up<s%> my <S%H838>goings<s%> in thy <S%H4570>paths,<s%> that my <S%H6471>footsteps<s%> <S%H4131>slip<s%> <S%H1077>not.<s%>

I <S%H589><s%> have called <S%H7121>upon<s%> thee, <S%H3588>for<s%> thou wilt <S%H6030>hear<s%> me, O <S%H410>God:<s%> <S%H5186>incline<s%> thine <S%H241>ear<s%> unto me, and <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H565>speech.<s%>

Show thy marvelous <S%H6395>lovingkindness,<s%> <S%H2617><s%> O thou that <S%H3467>savest<s%> by thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%> them which put their <S%H2620>trust<s%> in thee from those that rise <S%H4480>up<s%> <S%H6965><s%> against them.
Keep <S%H8104><s%> me as the <S%H380>apple<s%> <S%H1323><s%> of the <S%H5869>eye,<s%> <S%H5641>hide<s%> me under the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of thy <S%H3671>wings,<s%>
From <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H2098>that<s%> <S%H7703>oppress<s%> me, from my <S%H5315>deadly<s%> <S%H341>enemies,<s%> who compass me <S%H5362>about.<s%> <S%H5921><s%>
They are enclosed <S%H5462>in<s%> their own <S%H2459>fat:<s%> with their <S%H6310>mouth<s%> they <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H1348>proudly.<s%>
They have <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H5437>compassed<s%> us in our <S%H838>steps:<s%> they have <S%H7896>set<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> bowing <S%H5186>down<s%> to the <S%H776>earth;<s%>
Like <S%H1825><s%> as a <S%H738>lion<s%> that is <S%H3700>greedy<s%> of his <S%H2963>prey,<s%> and as it were a young <S%H3715>lion<s%> <S%H3427>lurking<s%> in secret <S%H4565>places.<s%>

Arise, <S%H6965><s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H6923>disappoint<s%> <S%H6440><s%> him, cast him <S%H3766>down:<s%> <S%H6403>deliver<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H4480>wicked,<s%> <S%H7563><s%> which is thy sword: <S%H2719><s%>

From <S%H4480>men<s%> <S%H4962><s%> which are thy <S%H3027>hand,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> from <S%H4480>men<s%> <S%H4962><s%> of the <S%H4480>world,<s%> <S%H2465><s%> which have their <S%H2506>portion<s%> in this <S%H2416>life,<s%> and whose <S%H990>belly<s%> thou <S%H4390>fillest<s%> with thy <S%H6845>hid<s%> treasure: they are <S%H7646>full<s%> of <S%H1121>children,<s%> and <S%H5117>leave<s%> the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of their substance to their <S%H5768>babes.<s%>
As for <S%H589>me,<s%> I will <S%H2372>behold<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness:<s%> I shall be <S%H7646>satisfied,<s%> when I <S%H6974>awake,<s%> with thy <S%H8544>likeness.<s%>
